Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.gameplay.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class Entity extends Object
This class represents an entity on-screen. This can be any object that has a health value
Since:
3/11/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture
